PNSE.JK.summary: PT Pudjiadi and Sons Tbk operates hotels and hotel facilities. Its facilities include accommodation, offices, shopping, apartments, recreational, and entertainment facilities. The company is also involved in the property management and catering businesses. It operates in Jakarta, Bandung, Anyer, Cisarua, Bali, Lombok, Yogyakarta, and Flores. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Pudjiadi and Sons Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Istana Kuta Ratu Prestige.
